quick_answer.text: Salsa is low in calories at ~33 kcal per 100g, with high sodium and minimal fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tablespoon of salsa?
faqs.a: About 10 kcal for 1 tbsp (~16 g) of typical tomato salsa.
Yes, ~7 g carbs per 100 g, mostly from vegetables, with 1.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in salsa?
faqs.a: From added salt or natural in ingredients; ~650 mg per 100 g, but varies by recipe.

faqs.q: Calories in chunky vs smooth salsa?
faqs.a: Similar, around 30-40 kcal per 100 g; chunky may have slightly more fiber.

faqs.q: Does salsa have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.2 g fat and 1.5 g protein per 100 g, making it a light condiment.
